description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the denial of service vulnerability in the Windows Mobile Broadband driver (CVE-2024-43559):

1. Download and install the appropriate update package from the official Microsoft Update Catalog based on your operating system version.

   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2, apply KB5044284: [Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5044285: [Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2, apply KB5044280: [Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2, apply KB5044273: [Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a NULL pointer dereference issue that could lead to a denial of service in the Mobile Broadband driver.
- The vulnerability has been rated with an importance severity level due to its impact.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running one of the specified Windows versions.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
